title: Prostate Cancer
description: Doctors at NYU Langone's Perlmutter Cancer Center are experts in the most advanced techniques for prostate cancer diagnosis. Learn more.
cleaned_text: Our nationally and internationally known specialists offer the most up-to-date, research-backed prostate cancer treatments, including targeted ablation using cryo-ablation and high-intensity focused ultrasound, or HIFU. Our comprehensive services include precision screening, diagnosis, post-treatment rehabilitation, and integrative therapies, as well as second opinion consultations to help you better understand your testing and treatment options. Perlmutter Cancer Center doctors share in the growing consensus among top prostate cancer specialists that many men are being overtreated for prostate cancer. We work together to identify which men are best served by aggressive treatment and those who can be treated safely with a more conservative approach. We believe in empowering you with information, so that you can actively partner in creating a personalized treatment plan that's right for you.
